title: 107_s1391
content: SAFE Grant Act of 2001 - Directs the Attorney General to establish a program to award and disburse annual grants to Sexual Assault Forensic Examiner (SAFE) programs. Requires a proposed or existing SAFE program, to receive a grant, to be in compliance with the standards and recommended national protocol developed by the Attorney General pursuant to the Victims of Trafficking and Violence Protection Act of 2000. Sets forth provisions regarding application requirements, priority for programs in underserved areas, non-exclusivity, and audits.
